oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band - December 1947 session (KVOO) - #07, #08, #09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band compiled studio recordings from the December 1947 session, likely cut by KVOO, Tulsa, OK. This disc includes master takes for numbers 7, 8, and 9, which were dubbed from other discs (see also TR001661).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Don't Let Your True Love Fly Away -- Coconut Grove -- Lonesome Hearted Blues
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-
